statuslist.title: A - Answering Machine
statuslist.description: Agent-defined Answering Machine

statuslist.title: AA - Answering Machine Auto
statuslist.description: Dialer-defined Answering Machine

statuslist.title: AFAX - Fax Machine Auto
statuslist.description: Dialer-defined Fax Machine

statuslist.title: AL - Answering Machine Msg Played
statuslist.description: AMD (Answering Machine Detection) call sent to a message and message has been played

statuslist.title: AM - Answering Machine Sent to Msg
statuslist.description: AMD (Answering Machine Detection) call sent to a message to be played

statuslist.title: B - Busy
statuslist.description: Carrier-received Busy signal, or agent-defined Busy if allowed

statuslist.title: CALLBK - Call Back
statuslist.description: Callback, both scheduled and non-scheduled

statuslist.title: CBHOLD - Call Back Hold
statuslist.description: Scheduled ANYONE callback that has not hit its trigger, or an

statuslist.title: DC - Disconnected Number
statuslist.description: Disconnected number

statuslist.title: DEC - Declined Sale
statuslist.description: Agent-defined status

statuslist.title: DNC - DO NOT CALL
statuslist.description: If defined, lead will also go in the Ytel DNC list

statuslist.title: DNCC - DO NOT CALL Hopper Match Campaign
statuslist.description: Status of a lead that matches the phone number of a lead that has been placed in the Ytel Campaign-specific DNC list for this Campaign

statuslist.title: DNCL - DO NOT CALL Hopper Match
statuslist.description: Status of a lead that matches the phone number of a lead that has been placed in the Ytel DNC list

statuslist.title: DROP - Agent Not Available
statuslist.description: Call was dropped while customer was waiting for an agent

statuslist.title: ERI - Agent Error
statuslist.description: An agent has closed their browser before dispositioning a lead

statuslist.title: HOLDTO - Hold time option
statuslist.description: Hold time option call termination on inbound call

statuslist.title: HXFER - Hold Recall Transfer
statuslist.description: Hold Recall Transfer to another in-group

statuslist.title: INCALL - Lead Being Called
statuslist.description: Agent is talking to the lead

statuslist.title: N - No Answer
statuslist.description: Agent-defined status

statuslist.title: NA - No Answer AutoDial
statuslist.description: Any outbound call that does not receive an Answer signal (or other signal) from the carrier. This can include ring-no-answer, disconnected, carrier congestion and other errors

statuslist.title: NEW - New Lead
statuslist.description: Lead has not been called, or cannot be called

statuslist.title: NI - Not Interested
statuslist.description: Agent-defined status

statuslist.title: NP - No Pitch No Price
statuslist.description: Agent-defined status

statuslist.title: PM - Played Message
statuslist.description: Outbound broadcast or SURVEY campaign status for when a message has been played to the customer

statuslist.title: PU - Call Picked Up
statuslist.description: Status that a call is changed to as soon as the carrier has sent the Answer signal and before the call is sent on to an agent

statuslist.title: QUEUE - Lead to Be Called
statuslist.description: Lead is about to be sent to an agent

statuslist.title: QVMAIL
statuslist.description: Queue Abandon Voicemail Left

statuslist.title: RQXFER - Re-Queue Transfer
statuslist.description: Re-Queue Transfer back to agent

statuslist.title: SALE - Sale Made
statuslist.description: Agent-defined status

statuslist.title: SVYEXT - Survey sent to Extension
statuslist.description: Survey outbound campaign status only

statuslist.title: SVYHU - Survey Hungup
statuslist.description: Survey outbound campaign status only

statuslist.title: SVYREC - Survey sent to Record
statuslist.description: Survey outbound campaign status only

statuslist.title: SVYVM - Survey sent to Voicemail
statuslist.description: Survey outbound campaign status only

statuslist.title: XDROP - Agent Not Available IN
statuslist.description: Call was dropped while customer was waiting for an agent on an inbound call

statuslist.title: XFER - Call Transferred
statuslist.description: Call has been sent from an agent to a Closer agent
